item.title: Setup 1Album Blackbox on your computer
item.description: 1Album Blackbox is the storage backend for 1Album. It can be installed on Windows, Mac OSX, Linux, NAS devices, and many other environments that can run a Docker container.

item.title: Sign in to 1Album from your phone
item.description: Install 1Album app on your iPhone or iPad and sign in with your Facebook account. Other sign in methods are comming.

item.title: Link 1Album Blackbox to your account
item.description: Link 1Album Blackbox to your account by entering your blackbox’s device code in 1Album app.

item.title: That's it!
item.description: Now 1Album app will back up photos and videos on your phone to your 1Album Blackbox automatically. You can delete some or all of the backed up items from your phone to free up space, and you still have access to all of the items from 1Album app through a secured peer-to-peer connection links directly to your 1Album Blackbox.
